detail.name: IPv4
detail.description: An IPv4 address indicating the online location of a server or other computer.

detail.name: IPv6
detail.description: An IPv6 address indicating the online location of a server or other computer.

detail.name: domain
detail.description: A domain name for a website or server. Domains encompass a series of hostnames.

detail.name: hostname
detail.description: The hostname for a server located within a domain.

detail.name: email
detail.description: An email associated with suspicious activity.

detail.name: URL
detail.description: Uniform Resource Location (URL) summarizing the online location of a file or resource.

detail.name: URI
detail.description: Uniform Resource Indicator (URI) describing the explicit path to a file hosted online.

detail.name: FileHash-MD5
detail.description: A MD5-format hash that summarizes the architecture and content of a file.

detail.name: FileHash-SHA1
detail.description: A SHA-format hash that summarizes the architecture and content of a file.

detail.name: FileHash-SHA256
detail.description: A SHA-256-format hash that summarizes the architecture and content of a file.

detail.name: FileHash-PEHASH
detail.description: A PEPHASH-format hash that summarizes the architecture and content of a file.

detail.name: FileHash-IMPHASH
detail.description: An IMPHASH-format hash that summarizes the architecture and content of a file.

detail.name: CIDR
detail.description: Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) address, which describes both a server's IP address and the network architecture (routing path) surrounding that server.

detail.name: FilePath
detail.description: A unique location in a file system.

detail.name: Mutex
detail.description: The name of a mutex resource describing the execution architecture of a file.

detail.name: CVE
detail.description: Common Vulnerability and Exposure (CVE) entry describing a software vulnerability that can be exploited to engage in malicious activity.
